name: The Good Sister
description:
Feel free to explore the Doll's house, but be careful to not lose your soul in the process.

In "The Good Sister, you play as a witch who's transported her soul to the body of a doll, and must find the diary hidden inside the house to remember how to go back. The thing is, you don't know where it could be. Do your best to try to find it!

LudumDare page: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/51/the-good-sisters
